ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Tavatron placed a gentle hand on Dinobot s shoulder. It s alright. No reason to get upset. We ll just ask Liono about it when he gets back. Tavatron smiles

Tavatron placed a gentle hand on Dinobot's shoulder.

"It's alright. No reason to get upset. We'll just ask Liono about it when he 
gets back."

Tavatron smiles reassuringly at Dinobot. She knew that allowing an arachnid 
to join their ranks was a big security risk, but all they could do was wait 
for Liono's return and then voice their concern. Tavatron sighed inwardly, 
what more could they do without violating orders?
